thread.title: Jet made emergency landing because part had been installed upside down
thread.title_full: Jet made emergency landing because part had been installed upside down | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Jet made emergency landing because part had been installed upside down
text:
The part had been installed upside down Credit: ITV A report has revealed that a plane full of passengers had to make an emergency landing at Gatwick airport without deploying some of its landing gear - because a part had been installed upside down. The pilot of the Virgin Atlantic jet tried to shake the wheels free before carrying out the emergency landing in December.
Last updated Fri 9 Oct 2015 Travel
